conversation_summary:
Conversation summary and ordered change log:
1. Initial requests: integrate social links and create styled placeholders for missing links; major aesthetic redesign requested; blood-red/black theme desired; light theme readability improvements requested; theme switcher behavior and visuals iteratively refined; accessibility toggle added then removed per user instruction; grouping of links into portfolio and contact stacks requested; sorting planned.

2. Key Implementations (chronological):
- Added social links and disabled placeholders using `button--disabled` + `aria-disabled` attributes.
- Implemented 3-theme system (`theme-blood`, `theme-dark`, `theme-light`) via CSS variables and `html` class toggles; added localStorage persistence.
- Applied glassmorphism container, gradients, animated glows, avatar effects, and premium animations for title and buttons.
- Theme switcher created and iteratively improved: emoji -> SVG icons, auto-collapse behavior, replaced hover-open with click-only, hamburger toggle, removed small indicator dot, enforced ARIA handling and keyboard navigation.
- Brand-based button coloring implemented via `css/brands.css` variables (`--button-background`, `--button-text`, `--button-border`) with fallbacks used in `css/style.css`.
- Accessibility features (skip link and a11y toggle) were added and later removed per user request.
- Darkened and intensified the blood-red palette, tuned light theme contrast and icon visibility (drop-shadows), and fixed collapsed switcher sizing to be an exact circle (48×48) with GPU rendering hints to avoid subpixel flattening.
- Grouped links into `#portfolio-links` and `#contact-links` containers in `index.html` to prepare for sorting.
- Added client-side sorting script to `index.html` that alphabetizes active links first, then inactive links, using `Intl.Collator` and rebuilding the container.

3. Files touched (high-level):
- `index.html`: added/updated theme switcher markup, click-only toggle behavior, grouped link containers, inserted sorting JS.
- `css/style.css`: theme variable tuning, glassmorphism, animations, collapsed switcher sizing and rendering hints, light theme contrast fixes.
- `css/brands.css`: brand color variables used by buttons.
- `assistant_context.json`: updated modification_log entries and appended this conversation summary and the sorting entry.

4. Pending/Completed items captured in the conversation and reflected in this file:
- Portfolio/contact grouping: completed.
- Sorting script: completed and injected into `index.html`.
- Update of `assistant_context.json`: this update (appended summary and log).

5. Notes for future work:
- If the collapsed switcher still displays visual flattening on some displays, consider hiding other top-right fixed elements or further forcing even-pixel dimensions and removing transform hacks from parent elements.
- The separator inserted between active and inactive links is a small `div.link-separator` with height `0.5rem`; CSS styling can be added in `css/style.css` for visual preference.
